name: Eludoran
description:
Basic fight style mini game, based on characters and setting from world-record breaking poem Eludoran; available on amazon in hardcover and paperback format. http://www.amazon.com/Eludoran-Legend-Lorelei-Gest...

Play as one of two characters, each with distinct move set and animations

Follow on-screen key-prompts to dodge and land counter attacks.
(hit keyboard arrow keys to match the arrows on screen)

Adjustable slider for scaling levels of difficulty.
